text: Dryas is a genus of flowering plants in the family Rosaceae. There are three species and one hybrid: *Dryas drummondii – Drummond's avens *Dryas integrifolia – Entire-leaved avens *Dryas octopetala – Mountain avens *Dryas × suendermannii – D. drummondii × D. octopetala Category:Rosaceae
title: Dryas (plant)
